     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10198325">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10198325">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10198325">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Video databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10198325">
          <div id="boxatt10198325" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24317689">
              <a id="link_24317689" href="http://blcvideoclips.berkeley.edu/index.php/login" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24317689,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24317689}); ">
               Berkeley Language Center Library of Foreign Language Film Clips
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The BLC’s Library of Foreign Language Film Clips (LFLFC) is a collection of clips cut from foreign language films that have been tagged for language (vocabulary tags in the L2) and English descriptors of the clip content (significant culture, linguistic forms, or speech acts). As of 1/1/2014, the LFLFC contained more than 15,500 clips in 24 languages from approximately 400 films; the BLC has in its collection 1500 films and is continually adding new clips to the collection. Temporary access permitted for all Muhlenberg affiliates. For login and password, email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24317688">
              <a id="link_24317688" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.alexanderstreet.com/feat" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24317688,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 17048813}); ">
               New World Cinema
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes over 200 full-length feature films from leading independent distributors. All films were presented at major film festivals, many were nominated for awards, and many have won major awards. Students of cinema will find titles by many of the leading contemporary directors of world cinema, such as Andrei Zvyagintsev, Koji Wakamatsu, Wong Kar-Wai and Jean-Luc Godard, illustrating a wide range of cinematographic techniques. The narratives provide a rich window onto cultures and sociological issues from around the world.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20879872">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20879872">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20879872">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Videos in Trexler Library, as of 5/15/15
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20879872">
          <div id="boxatt20879872" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24348553">
              <a id="link_24348553" href="http://muhlenberg.worldcat.org/profiles/aftonkdc/lists/3553239" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24348553,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24348553}); ">
               French DVD
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24348623">
              <a id="link_24348623" href="https://muhlenberg.worldcat.org/profiles/aftonkdc/lists/3553336" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24348623,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24348623}); ">
               French VHS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24348626">
              <a id="link_24348626" href="https://muhlenberg.worldcat.org/profiles/aftonkdc/lists/3553236" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24348626,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24348626}); ">
               German DVD
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24348628">
              <a id="link_24348628" href="https://muhlenberg.worldcat.org/profiles/aftonkdc/lists/3552565" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24348628,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24348628}); ">
               German VHS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">

             </li>

       <div id="wrapbox20850387">

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20850387">

           Newspapers

             <li id="link25171054">
